thread.title: BRIEF-Soitec Q2 sales up 23 pct at 55.4 mln euros
thread.title_full: BRIEF-Soitec Q2 sales up 23 pct at 55.4 mln euros

title: BRIEF-Soitec Q2 sales up 23 pct at 55.4 mln euros
text:
BRIEF-Soitec Q2 sales up 23 pct at 55.4 mln euros 
Oct 19 Soitec SA : 
* Reports H1 consolidated sales of 110.8 million euros ($125.4 million), up 56 percent y-o-y 
* Q2 consolidated sales amount to 55.4 million euros, up 23 percent y-o-y 
* For the third quarter of fiscal year 2015-2016, the group expects sequential growth in sales of electronics activity by 5 percent compared to the second quarter (at constant exchange rates) Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: ($1 = 0.8837 euros) (Gdynia Newsroom) Trending On Reuters
